name: GKLeaderboardViewController
desc: The GKLeaderboardViewController class provides a standard user interface that displays leaderboard scores to the player. If the GKGameCenterViewController class is available, you should use it instead.

items.name: var category: String!
items.desc: The named leaderboard that is displayed by the view controller.
